gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer.Location

  • public class Location
extends Object
    Records where a declaration appears inside a DTD file. The public id refers to the file's public id (if any); the system id refers to the file name. Line number indicates the line number in the file where the declaration occurs.
    Author:
    Demian Hess

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location()
      Creates a new instance of Location
      Location(String sysId, String pubId, int line)
      Constructs instance using all supplied values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLineNumber()
      Returns the line number where the declaration occured within the DTD file.
      String getPublicId()
      Returns public identifier for the file containing the declaration.
      String getSystemId()
      Returns the system name of the file containing the declaration.
      void setLineNumber(int line)
      Sets line number of the declaration in the DTD file.

      Sets public identifier of the DTD file containing the declaration.

      Sets value of the filename

    • Constructor Detail

      • Location

        public Location()
        Creates a new instance of Location

      • Location

        public Location(String sysId,
        String pubId,
        int line)
        Constructs instance using all supplied values.
        Parameters:
        sysId - Filename of DTD; can be null if not known
        pubId - Public identifier of DTD; can be null
        line - Linenumber of declaration in DTD; should be -1 if unknown

    • Method Detail

      • getPublicId

        public String getPublicId()
        Returns public identifier for the file containing the declaration. If no id is available, returns null.
        Returns:
        Public identifier of the file.

      • getLineNumber

        public int getLineNumber()
        Returns the line number where the declaration occured within the DTD file. Returns -1 if no number is available.
        Returns:
        Line number of declaration

      • getSystemId

        public String getSystemId()
        Returns the system name of the file containing the declaration.
        Returns:
        File name or null if none

      • setLineNumber

        public void setLineNumber(int line)
        Sets line number of the declaration in the DTD file. Any value less than 0 is normalized to -1.
        Parameters:
        line - Line number of the declaration

      • setPublicId

        public void setPublicId(String pubId)
        Sets public identifier of the DTD file containing the declaration.
        Parameters:
        pubId - Public id of the dtd file

      • setSystemId

        public void setSystemId(String sysId)
        Sets value of the filename
        Parameters:
        sysId - Filename of the file containing the declaration
